ygData.subject: suggestions to Verant
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I agree.  Keep it short and simple...they may pay more attention that way.  thanks for compiling the suggestions anyway though. I like the ideas about
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I agree. Keep it short and simple...they may pay more attention that
way. thanks for compiling the suggestions anyway though.

I like the ideas about adjusting Root a little. And possibly tweaking our
abilities for attacking 6+ MOBs. Those new spell ideas are cool, but I
would think we would have a very slim chance of getting heard on those.
Better we work on refining the spells we have first.

-- Lim'Dul
17 Wiz Veeshan

>OK, a couple of thoughts...I like the idea of cutting back on the >number
>of
>requests...it sounds like we are just whining when we send a huge >list of
>demands!
